name: Thunderstrike: Operation Phoenix
synopsis: A deadly new adversary has struck at all the principal nations, paralyzing the world. The world's allied forces immediately call for a global summit, merging their weapons resources and technologies into a clandestine project entitled Operation Phoenix. In control of the most advanced Gun-Ship technology known to man, you're the best shot the free world has for peace.  Your objective is clear: Resolve All Situations.
